thread.section_title: Ticketmaster Resale Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ticketmaster Resale | resale.ticketmaster.com.au | 7 of 79
thread.title: John Davidson
thread.title_full: Ticketmaster Resale reviewed by John Davidson

author: John Davidson
title: John Davidson
text:
I purchased tickets to see Coldplay in Sydney on 14 December 2016 through Ticketmaster Resale. The tickets were overpriced, I paid a total of $691.00 for 2 x Gold Tickets. I got the tickets and they appeared to be valid, if not overpriced as the price on the tickets was about $150.00 each.
On 14 December 2016, I attended Alliance Stadium to attend the concert and found that the tickets I had purchased, did not scan. One of the ticket scanners informed me that I was scammed. I contacted Ticketmaster Resale about the issue I had and received an email advising that there was no evidence that the tickets were invalid and they can't offer any further assistance.
I was scammed
